about_the_game:
When the theft of a parallelogram puts the local art community in a tizzy, Detective Mane is there to help. Take on the role of Detective Leonardo Mane, local private investigator and lion. Explore the savanna town and question the residents to gather three key clues. Solve the case and save the day, for art and karaoke.

More cases and mysteries, each in their own biome, await.

Features:
  • A top-down, cute, simple pixel art aesthetic.
  • Three different cases in three different areas, filled with interesting characters to interact with.
  • Loads of anthropomorphized animals in their native habitats to befriend and help out.
  • A casual, relaxing pace. Take your time solving the mysteries.
  • A karaoke party.
